website_summaries.verdict: We like that this model offers two light controlling features, but the Bali Blinds shade edges them out in overall quality.
pros: Available in light filtering or room darkening models
cons: Somewhat challenging to install, and might require additional tools

customer_reviews.title: Downgrading to 1 star
customer_reviews.text: Edit: Downgrade to 1 star. After hanging for six weeks they are sagging in the centre of the top rail. Complete junk IMO Edit: Downgrade to 3 stars because after being drawn for a week while away they would not go all the way up. Like trying to push a wet noodle. I'm not impressed :( I won't return them but I'm not a fan of the button mechanism. Don't see the need after having many other brands that work fine without that feature.
customer_reviews.author: Abbott

customer_reviews.title: wrong product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one first, received in time and installation went well. Everything was as advertised and would have given five stars. Ordered a second one and disaster. Wrong type of shades! Instead of "room darkening cellular shades" it was roller shade with either vinyl or cloth, not sure. But have to admit this is my first bad experience with Amazon. Debating should I order again or go to the local box store to pick one up?
customer_reviews.author: Masala Dosai

customer_reviews.title: blackout shade
customer_reviews.text: I bought two shades for my bedroom. The small one seems to work better than the larger one that is cut to 39 inches. The first 39 inch shade would not raise on one side after a few weeks. I've been sent a new one and it doesn't want to raise all the way without a lot of coaching. I prefer the shades that don't have a button on the bottom. These have to have the button pushed to go up or down and it is awkward to operate sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Works as described fairly easy to cut but the knife included was not much ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as described fairly easy to cut but the knife included was not much help. The knife cut the cellular easily but the plasitc frame was much more difficult. this is very close to a blackout but in my install it is a dark hallway. I just ordered the filtering so we'll see. the button is very easy to raise or lower, very smooth operation. I feel like this will last about 5 years but in my case we never open this window (condo kitchen hard to get to) but time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: dfphoto

customer_reviews.title: Kids have used these a year now and still work like new.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap solution without feeling overly cheap. Days after installing, one of the 3 I bought fell apart at a glued seam. I contacted the seller who asked for an emailed photo of the failure. After I sent it, they immediately sent a replacement. Kids have used these a year now and still work like new.
customer_reviews.author: DadK

customer_reviews.title: Way over priced and misled
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these blings for $46.00, which I thought was a decent price. Once received there was a price sticker on the package $25.00. The quality is more like what you’d get for $25 and these are definitely not worth what I paid. I will be returning. I found comparable blinds that come in a wide range of sizes in Home Depot’s website and will ordering from there.
customer_reviews.author: Juliann Richling

customer_reviews.title: Great for Room Darkening
customer_reviews.text: I bought this two years ago for a bedroom bathroom. It keeps light out better than the bedroom roller shade. The reason it keeps light out better is because it can be cut precisely to avoid light coming in at the sides. It does pass a small amount of light through the shade but overall it blocks more light than the roller shade, because of the tight fit, even though the roller shade does not pass any light through the actual shade. Recently, the raising and lowering mechanism is showing some ware, but even if it broke today I'd buy it again and keep my 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Best deal for the money I could find.
customer_reviews.text: These are very easy to put up and do the job nicely. They look great too. Be sure to cut them on top of a cutting board though. The knife they send with the blinds is pretty sharp and I thought cutting on a piece of the box would be sufficient protection for my desk... wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Stan R.

customer_reviews.title: These are a piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a Christmas gift and when my daughter opened them they were both busted up. Now I can’t return and can’t use them because they look like crap. Very disappointed. I should be able to return if they were a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Diane L Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Stop working after few uses
customer_reviews.text: after few months of use the blinds stop working by not self rolling up and staying put please do not by this is very expensive and do not last long enough. I bought 3 of these and 2 already stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Mr emv

customer_reviews.title: Easy to move
customer_reviews.text: We did not have to cut to fit our window. Love how easy it is to move up and down and no cords. Does a great job on keeping the bright morning sun out of my eyes. The window in our bedroom faces east so the morning sun was waking me up too early.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: a great find
customer_reviews.text: I have these on three windows now. These are perfect for my needs and a great price besides. They offer complete privacy and darkening at night but during the day they can't be seen under the valence. Much better than toxic vinyl pull-down blinds and much more affordable and opaque than fabric blinds.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Nice shade. But the mechanicals failed.
customer_reviews.text: I installed it in the evening pulled it down for the night. In the morning push the button to release it and I hear A snapping sound and it doesn’t work. This was the first time I attempted to use it. Somethings spring loose in the button control. Must return it.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Tagged from another store and cheaper than what I paid
customer_reviews.text: So dissatisfied with these. They are made ok, but will not close completely, they end up drooping on the ends. The biggest kick is that they had tags from ocean state job lot and were 40$, I paid more than that! Too bad I had them cut to size before I saw the tags and saw they did not close well.
customer_reviews.author: Bruins babe

customer_reviews.title: Best Shades EVER! Love them.
customer_reviews.text: My Hubby and I love these. we have 10 of them. They look great. The are easy to cut to fit, everything provided. I will update if anything go wrong with them.
customer_reviews.author: tory

customer_reviews.title: Truly room darkening
customer_reviews.text: I got this for our bedroom as my husband periodically works graveyard shifts and sleeps during the day. I did an outside mount quite easily. If you wanted total darkness during the brightest sunlight, you would need to do an inside mount so there is no gap around the edge. This works perfectly for us.
customer_reviews.author: JMC

customer_reviews.title: Easy does it and quicker than custom
customer_reviews.text: Perfect room darkening shade. Definitely needed a drill to install plastic snap-in hardware. But shades then went up super simply in NYC apt. Hope the mechanism lasts. Perfect for look and functionality I was looking for. Loved the ease of trimming to size right st home. Definitely would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: BLueslover

customer_reviews.title: loved this at first
customer_reviews.text: loved this at first, but has had to be taken down half dozen times to fix wiring; it loses balance and is no longer straight. A bit expensive for the aggravation.
customer_reviews.author: Joy A. Augenstern

customer_reviews.title: Simple to cut and mount
customer_reviews.text: We were going to order from Pennys, for around $400.00 for 2. Your blinds were simple to cut and mount. Too easy. I will order 2 more. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Not black out, but definitely the perfect amount of room darkening! My 4 year old has been sleeping in about an hour later since we installed it!! Yayyy! Mom win!
customer_reviews.author: LittleStinker87

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love these so much! So easy to install, easy to cut and size, and easier still to use! Nice and dark, too. They are perfect in my kids' rooms.
customer_reviews.author: mama2emnchar

customer_reviews.title: Works as Advertized
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job of blocking out almost all light.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: nice looking
customer_reviews.text: works great the room is nice and dark.although not that easy to cut to size i needed a saw not the knife they supplied.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: I've had them for about 2 weeks now, they ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had them for about 2 weeks now, they move smoothly up and down and look much more expensive then they are! My kitchen and Bathroom face the South and I get sooo much sun during the day (which my plants love) but come summer that alone would have put my house as a sauna! Cutting was a little hard but once I got the technique down all 4 I bought went up in a jiff. I'll be buying more for upstairs just wanted to test them out before putting more money towards Blinds!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Prodct
customer_reviews.text: The blinds were great. Really easy to cut and install. Nevertheless, the product came damaged. It's bent in half so it sags in the middle. Other than that it seems worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Demons

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with these blinds. Fit our window right out of the box, no need to cut to size. Had them installed within ten minutes. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Julie K

customer_reviews.title: Too bad.
customer_reviews.text: I'm so bummed that this shade broke after only 3 months of normal use! The blinds just separated from the top piece. I don't think it's fixable. They worked well, blocking unwanted light during nap time, until they broke. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: J. S.

customer_reviews.title: DON’T BUT THIS! BREAKS easily!
customer_reviews.text: DONT BUY THIS. Broke within months (wouldn’t retract up any more) and the seller basically said “tough luck”; didn’t even attempt to make it right. And this isn’t even a shade we use on a daily basis so it’s not like it was from too much wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I bought two and within 3 months one broke, wouldn't stay up. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Dr Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Came with all materials needed to custom fit. Easy DYI. The room darkening is perfect. Really keeps the light out. Easy to move up and down. Looks great in the room. Quality is great for this reasonable price. I purchased more, after initial buy, they worked so well.
customer_reviews.author: rainey

customer_reviews.title: BEST Cordless Cellular
customer_reviews.text: Fits my window perfect, so easy to install, pure white and slides up and down easily. The right thickness and no see through. Great product and will be ordering more. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Blocking out light
customer_reviews.text: The blind was very easy to install and blocked out light as I hoped it would. I would order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Mona Harsila

customer_reviews.title: ez fit shade
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived quickly & was as advertised. It fit like it should & was easy to trim, AA++
customer_reviews.author: SVO Cobra

customer_reviews.title: Came on time as ordered
customer_reviews.text: The blinds were as advertised, they were easy to install and work great!!
customer_reviews.author: Russell Corcoran

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered six of these for my mom and they're exactly what she wanted. She was very pleased with the quality, and we were very pleased with the ease of installation. Recommended without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: S.C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, blocks out almost all light, very happy and sleeping better
customer_reviews.author: Jackie K

customer_reviews.title: The perfect darkening shade
customer_reviews.text: I waS Confused on what to get. I wanted something to darken the room. Really darken it. This is it. The perfect shade. It darkens, is easy to Install, it’s durable, and nice to look at. This is the one
customer_reviews.author: David Midgley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works beautifully over kitchen sink. Lets in light and provides privacy. Easy to install and use.
customer_reviews.author: Renee B.

customer_reviews.title: True 5 star purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a house we were selling to give a cleaner appearance. These worked great, looked nice and installed quickly. Am now buying for our new house to darken the baby room. And they are cordless.
customer_reviews.author: DENNIS O.

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Not exactly "white."
customer_reviews.text: These were easy to install at a great price point compared to other shades. The color is a cool greyish white. So if you have warm tones or white, you'll see it as grey. It's fine for now, like I said, great price and it works.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Barounis

customer_reviews.title: Bought five, one failed
customer_reviews.text: After a couple of weeks of use, one of the blinds stopped coming down - the mechanism froze up and rendered the blind useless. Worse, since they're trimmable, I couldn't return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Truly Room Darkening
customer_reviews.text: Truly room darkening! The cutter required some muscle when cutting through the plastic ends, but finished cuts looks very neat. Overall good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Loyal Essence Reader

customer_reviews.title: Good, clean look
customer_reviews.text: The shades went up easily following instructions. They give a newness to a traditional guest bedroom. I ordered the ivory, which actually reads a bit more like kakhi, but that's not a drawback. We are pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: These shades are the BOMB!! I put them ...
customer_reviews.text: These shades are the BOMB!! I put them up myself with no problem and they are very attractive at my windows.
customer_reviews.author: E Faulconer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: We really like that these are not just room darkening but they block out all of the light.
customer_reviews.author: terry johnson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, work well
customer_reviews.text: These are great shades, easy to trim to size and fairly easy to install. Really work well, will buy more
customer_reviews.author: dancer

customer_reviews.title: Broke instantly
customer_reviews.text: This shade broke instantly. The first time I pulled the shade down, the mechanism broke and now the shade won't contract.
customer_reviews.author: IAN

customer_reviews.title: Great, affordable find.
customer_reviews.text: Half the price of the other blinds similar to this and blocked out 99% of the sun for my nightshift working husband. Great find!
customer_reviews.author: Becca Ham

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good price, great style, easy to install and nice look
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Looks good and elegant, easy to put up or down.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: no good for walls. only good for inside window seam
customer_reviews.text: There is no hook to attach if the window does not have inside seam and needs to install on wall.
customer_reviews.author: AMIT Shah

customer_reviews.title: Fit and room darkening
customer_reviews.text: Used in bedroom. They fit perfectly. Very easy to put up and down.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Smith

customer_reviews.title: Look great
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for both my grandkids rooms. Easy to install and look nice. Quality is good and easy operation. Good darkening for bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Great blinds
customer_reviews.text: Not too difficult to install. Definitely blocks light Easy to open and close blinds. they look great.
customer_reviews.author: June in VA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect to keep the bright sun out of our baby's room!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: They broke after 6 weeks of use.
customer_reviews.text: They broke after 6 weeks. I wouldn’t purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: L. Giddens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to trim. Easy to install and block light and heat very well Very happy
customer_reviews.author: John  A   Jarrott

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with my blinds! We didn't have to cut them to fit but it looks like if we did would have been and easy process.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie K Hulet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's nice and simple. I hope it comes different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: They work perfectly. Very easy to install, They were exactly what I had hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M.

customer_reviews.title: It was so easy to trim to fit our windows
customer_reviews.text: It was so easy to trim to fit our windows. We put them on two windows in our dining room where we get sun all day.really keeps the heat out.we had mini blinds before and they actually warped from the heat.very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Diane G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice blinds-don't block light
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Super easy to install and even easier to use. They do not, however, block any light.
customer_reviews.author: mama2emnchar

customer_reviews.title: Custom, high quality blinds, super easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I've never heard of this company and can't find any information about them, but these blinds are FANTASTIC. I have never wanted to attempt to put up blinds and have always avoided doing so, until yesterday. They were easy to trim, easy to install and they look custom and block out light. What more can you ask for? It took me about an hour to do two windows. Just to be on the safe side, you should practice trimming a half inch at first, just so you get the hang of how it works. I am very impressed by these and will absolutely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Photography_n00b

customer_reviews.title: Eclipse!
customer_reviews.text: These things are great! I will be purchasing more. One of my children's bedroom is southern exposure so it gets a lot of sun, and these blinds do a phenomenal job at keeping the light out as well as the heat! The cordless design is great. Mounting them only takes a few minutes. Also, the jig and knife that they include is great for trimming, much better than others.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Mac

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect in size and functioning
customer_reviews.text: These were bought to replace what we had previously for 10 years. They are perfect in size and functioning. They definitely darken the room and that is exactly what we wanted. The lift system is easy and the install is also easy. Glad we got these. Actually darkens better than the first set.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Adamek

customer_reviews.title: These things are FANTASTIC! Living in an older SF apartment
customer_reviews.text: These things are FANTASTIC! Living in an older SF apartment, all the windows are single-pane and very uniquely sized. Cutting these to fit my needs wasn't difficult at all. In the summer these keep out the heat and in the winter they keep the warmth in. My boyfriend loves them as well! The thickness really keeps the city lights- and even most sounds- out.
customer_reviews.author: Ka. V.

customer_reviews.title: I work nights and needed a good black out blind and this works great for that ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price these blinds are hard to beat. I work nights and needed a good black out blind and this works great for that purpose. They look high quality and come with a knife to cut to the correct width for a custom fit. The knife is extremely sharp and I use it all over the house for other jobs. I only wish they made these in longer dimensions for some of my other windows. I had to order another one for a taller window from "select blinds" and it was over 3x the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Love these blinds! I bough then in Feb and just now installed them. I was disappointed that one of the blinds had a hairline crack in it. I should have opened them to check for defects sooner because now I’m stuck with it. But overall I am very happy. They were easy to cut and install. They look great on my bay window. They are light filtering not room darkening but this is what I wanted for the living room.
customer_reviews.author: DiannaLynn

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.text: These are FANTASTIC, so much less expensive than other cellular blackout shades. My only suggestion is, unless you have really great upper body strength, don't try cutting these with the enclosed "knife." I tried on one of mine and it was extremely hard to cut through and wasn't really straight. My second one, I cut with a table saw...much easier!! I will probably be ordering more for the rest of my apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought four of these, was hesitant to hang them myself. The trimming process is easy, they give you all the guides you need and a craft knife in the package, too! I like the mechanism that allows you to raise/lower the shade in the window, and for a paper shade, this one looks expensive. Just waiting to see now how long it takes to wear out - be sure to vacuum these to keep them clean.
customer_reviews.author: E. Solch

customer_reviews.title: The ability to trim it to fit
customer_reviews.text: Love the up and down button and the ability to trim it to fit. Will buy more as my other shades need replacement
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blinds are great
customer_reviews.text: We love our blinds, in fact we just ordered 4 more today. They are easy to cut(my husband used his miter saw to cut them to size which made the job very quick and easy. We already had 6 of these blinds in our bedroom and living room. We have had them for a couple of years and they still look and work just like new.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Watch for falling blind only snaps in.
customer_reviews.text: Easy install yet the Clips at the top to hold the unit are simple snaps. Should be screwed in. Thus pulling down the blind will drop unit on your head or damage the blind. My work around, use fishing wire to tie it to hidden screws at top to help protect your investment.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stutzman

customer_reviews.title: Very well-designed, and quick installation
customer_reviews.text: It's rare to find a truly well-designed product these days, but this shade qualifies. Even minor details have been thought of, such as the peel- off rulers you can temporarily stick to the shade to help cut in the right spot. Installation was easy and fast -- about ten minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light filtering privacy
customer_reviews.text: This shade was the perfect solution for our small half bath which required privacy but needed light. I am a 66 year old woman who was able to cut to size and install this shade myself. I love the nice clean look and the simplicity of operation.
customer_reviews.author: Cozy in New England

customer_reviews.title: I've used these many times before.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many of these shades before and had no problem. My most recent purchase, didn't operate right from the start. I will be contacting customer service to see what they will do, as I am just past the deadline for returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Gypseaspirit

customer_reviews.title: Great product and description
customer_reviews.text: Shade came on time and was easy to cut and the clips are holding it up in the window. Room darkening is great.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine S. Henton

customer_reviews.title: More made in china garbage
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. After raising and lowering the blind twice it's not level anymore. It looks like junk when it's hanging in anything but the total open posistion.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with these so far
customer_reviews.text: Happy with these so far. Just installed so not sure how durable they will be. They feel almost like paper so am very careful about how I raise/lower them. Love how dark they keep my bedrooms!
customer_reviews.author: Jude Gee

customer_reviews.title: VERY DARK!
customer_reviews.text: The inside of the cells looks black in the pictures on Amazon. But, it is shiny foil... quite effective. VERY DARK! It really was easy to cut using the knife and cutting guide provided. Very sharp! Be careful
customer_reviews.author: EddieLivin'

customer_reviews.title: Good Qualtiy, Cheaper at Ocean State Job Lots
customer_reviews.text: These are good shades, very good quality and easy to install. They also do a great job at darkening the room or you trim them very close to the dimension of the window. I'm very satisfied with the shade. These are the exact same shades that are sold at Ocean State Job Lots for $25. Mine came with the Job Lot sticker still on it with the $25 price scratched off.
customer_reviews.author: Charles P.

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install. Only concern is when opening them, you have to go slow; otherwise, the blind bunches up. This explains the 4 ⭐️. Have the light filtering on the north side of our house and the blackout on the south for that summer sun. We are happy with both options
customer_reviews.author: athey

customer_reviews.title: Option for odd sized windows
customer_reviews.text: These are so cool. It took some effort to trim them to size and you should probably use a cutting board. They were simple to install and easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Chipmunk

customer_reviews.title: it's fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's fantastic. My kids get the right amount of light in and this shade helps keep the rest out. It's not a black out shade but I don't have to worry about street lights blinding my daughter any more when she is trying to go to sleep
customer_reviews.author: C Hilburn

customer_reviews.title: Best shade I ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Best shade I ever purchased. Was above my expectations! It was the nicest shade I had ever seen and was so easy to cut and hang up! Couldn't believe how easy it was to install. Will recommend this shade to all my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Easy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Not a good light filter.
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing wrong with the product itself. Was easy to put up. Construction is well above average. Would buy again, but in a darker shade.
customer_reviews.author: Hiroller789

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality shade
customer_reviews.text: Hardware and instructions to install shade are great, nothing else required. The shade quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Old Salty

customer_reviews.title: Did the trick!
customer_reviews.text: First time our toddler did not wake us up at the crack of dawn - need we say more?
customer_reviews.author: Miriam M.

customer_reviews.title: Good value, easy installation, good blackout effect
customer_reviews.text: High quality and easy installation. These are perfect if you have windows that are a little off-size - my windows are supposedly 35" wide, but really more like 35.5". This is key with blackout shades especially, since you don't want big gaps on the sides that will let through light. The instructions are clear and the included knife and ruler sticker make it easy to make the necessary cuts I don't know how these will hold up over time, but they appear to be quite a big less expensive and better designed than the other blackout cell shades I've installed in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J

customer_reviews.title: You will want to buy more!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered us some of these almost 3 years ago. They have held up great. They are beautiful, and sturdy. I have now ordered more!
customer_reviews.author: CMZ

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: These blinds are great! They block the sunlight. They were so easy to trim, I was super nervous but it was easy! Super easy to install! Going to buy more for all our windows!
customer_reviews.author: Amalia Phillips

customer_reviews.title: These blinds look good for the price and were easy to install
customer_reviews.text: These blinds look good for the price and were easy to install. My only complaint is that the brackets are plastic and show from the front. Time will tell how they hold up but I am very happy with them at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Otterhound2

customer_reviews.title: Cordless, room darkening blinds
customer_reviews.text: We really like the blinds! Easy to use, cut to size, appreciate that they’re cordless and room darkening. We have them in all our bedrooms.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Wise

customer_reviews.title: but the whole procedure was wonderfully easy from start to finish
customer_reviews.text: I just got through installing the shade on the outside of a French door; I'm not a very handy person, but the whole procedure was wonderfully easy from start to finish. I had the shade cut to fit, installed, and operative within half an hour!
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect-love these roomdarkening shades
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. I did myself. Exterior install. Did not have to cut. They really work nicely to raise and lower. Darken perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Delaware1st

customer_reviews.title: Like the Room Darkening Shades
customer_reviews.text: Installation was relatively straight forward. The provided cutting blade was nice and did the trick. Be careful - measure twice. Room darkening was indeed room darkening. As we have any other windows that need a shade - will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: These used to be very nice - now, bulky, bulbous, ugly.
customer_reviews.text: And what is the point of that stupid button? Seriosly, way to take a great product and ruin it!
customer_reviews.author: NY/Boston Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Have been using them for about four month now with no issues. Darkens the room also.
customer_reviews.author: David OHalloran

customer_reviews.title: Treat it right and it'll last a long time
customer_reviews.text: Like it. A little pricy but it's of good qualty
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great product, poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: Have multiple of these blinds, just reordered one more. Arrived broken on bottom near a joint still functioning and looks ok.
customer_reviews.author: davidgizys

product_meta.title: The Miro Brand, 48" x 64" Room Darkening Cellular Window Shade, Cordless, Trimmable (White)
product_meta.description: Color:Room Darkening White| Size:48"X64"The cordless cellular room darkening window shade is constructed from textured non-woven polyester fabric that gently blocks natural light from filtering into the room without sacrificing privacy. The cellular fabric also provides a level of insulation to stop cold or hot air at your window. This shade features a unique spring tension device located inside the bottom rail for cordless operation, to operate simply just press the button located on the bottom rail and pull or push. The cordless cellular shade is easy to size and install at home. If you need to cut down the shade to fit a window, you can use the included utility knife and sizing tools; however, we recommend using a heavy duty knife or saw to cut more efficiently. The maximum reduction is 18-inches; 9-inches from either side of the shade. The shade is 100% cordless, so it is safe for children and pets.
feature_bullets: The 48-inch by 64-inch cordless cellular room darkening window shade can be cut up to 18-inches; 9-inches on each side
Constructed from non-woven polyester fabric that gently blocks natural light from filtering into the room while also providing a level of insulation to keep out summer heat and winter cold
Features a unique spring tension device located inside the bottom rail for cordless operation; to operate simply press the button located on the bottom rail and pull or push
Light duty utility knife and sizing tool included (we recommend using a heavy duty utility knife or saw to cut more efficiently)
